overview: Set in the west, Cuenta Saldada tells the story of Vicente (Gerardo Albarrán), a man who is injured when he is singing. The protagonist is so bad that he is on the verge of death, but he resists because his family needs him urgently and resigns himself to live until everything is in order.
tagline: Vicente came like an angel fallen from the sky, here to defend those who cannot defend themselves.
title: The Bill Paid Off
